messages.subject: Web Site

messages.messageBody:
I just posted a long winded story of our day. I have to share this
great site with you.
http://www.pbs.org
This is just the basic pbs site which can be very interesting...From
there you can either get to the Nova home page, or go to Nova Online
home page by this url
http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/nova/
Then go explore the Secrets of the lost Empires. If you click on
Medieval Siege, and then scroll down and click on Destroy The Castle,
you can play like we did. It was really fun. The whole family got into
this. There is lots of interesting other things to find too.
Just wanted to share....
Ann
